Class AnimationManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.ui.AnimationManager
public class AnimationManager extends Object
AnimationManager - Centralizes all animation logic in the game. Single Responsibility: Create and manage all game animations. Responsibilities: - Line clear animations (fade and scaling effects) - Screen shake effects (game over impact) - Game over pulse animations - Pause menu slide-in animations - Score notification animations This class isolates animation complexity from the main GuiController.
